roleset.name: regard as valuable
roleset.note: ESTEEM-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from esteem.01-v)

example.name: transitive, arg0 and arg1
example.text: Akayev also highly esteemed the fruitful co-operation between the scientistsand technicians of the two countries .
example.arg: the fruitful co-operation between the scientists and technicians of the two countries
